item.title: Houdini - FLIP
item.description: FLIP in SOP Container FLIP container Creates a domain for a SOP FLIP fluid simulation. SideFx docs This node creates and initializes a SOP particle fluid domain. The Particle Separation parameter controls the domainâ€™s resolution, but also the number of particles and voxels, and the resolution of collision objects. Boundary FLIP boundary Creates a surface or density VDB for sourcing or deleting SOP FLIP fluid particles.
